Class JsonVariableStorage

java.lang.Object
io.github.syst3ms.skriptparser.variables.VariableStorage
com.github.skriptdev.skript.api.skript.variables.JsonVariableStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class JsonVariableStorage extends VariableStorage
Instance of VariableStorage that stores variables in a JSON file.
